description: Fashion periodical with green paper covers bound with one tri-fold hand-colored engraving of a bedroom interior with a canopy bed with pink fabric in the center, a pink couch on the left-hand side, and a fireplace on the right-hand side with a gold clock on the mantel
portfolio: From Magasin des Modes nouvelles, françaises et anglaises, Paris, 1786-89
title: Magasin des Modes Nouvelles, Seconde Année, Treizième Cahier, 20 Mars 1787
